org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel

Class XSLFTableRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XSLFTableRow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<XSLFTableCell> 

    public class XSLFTableRow
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<XSLFTableCell>
    Represents a table in a .pptx presentation(表示. ppyx演示文稿中的表)

      • removeCell

        public void removeCell(int colIdx)
        Remove the cell at the given index.(删除给定索引处的单元格。)
        Parameters:
        colIdx - the column index.(colIdx -列索引。)
        Since:
        POI 4.1.2

      • mergeCells

        public void mergeCells(int firstCol,
                       int lastCol)
        Merge cells of a table row, inclusive. Indices are 0-based.(合并表行的单元格（含）。指数以0为基础。)
        Parameters:
        firstCol - 0-based index of first column to merge, inclusive(要合并的第一列的基于firstCol - 0的索引（含）)
        lastCol - 0-based index of last column to merge, inclusive(要合并的最后一列的基于lastCol - 0的索引（含）)
